General.Name: Eastern Air Logistics Co Ltd
General.Description: Eastern Air Logistics Co., Ltd. provides air express, comprehensive ground, and multimodal transport services. The company provides air cargo logistics services covering international and domestic airline networks, including cargo aircraft transportation and passenger aircraft bellyhold transportation; ground services, such as assembly, sorting, transfer, and warehousing of flight import and export cargo; assistance in the completion of flight inbound and outbound cargo document information operations; and supporting customs supervision area warehousing services for the inspection of air cargo. It also offers integrated logistics solutions, including cross-border e-commerce, inter-industry project supply chain, air special cargo, direct delivery to the origin, and personalized supply chain solutions. In addition, the company provides shipping agency, and truck flight services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, China. Eastern Air Logistics Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Eastern Airlines Industry Investment Co., Ltd.
